title: 2004 in games
text: This page lists <a href="board%20game">board</a> and <a href="card%20game">card game</a>s, <a href="Wargaming">wargame</a>s, <a href="Miniature%20wargaming">miniature games</a>, and <a href="tabletop%20role-playing%20game">tabletop role-playing game</a>s published in 2004. For video games, see <a href="2004%20in%20video%20gaming">2004 in video gaming</a>.
